name: Aleksandria
startIntroPart1: Hail Lyosha, may your laurus dreams bring countless glory upon thee, great Caesar of Aleksandria! Under your enlightened empire lies the vast expanse of the harsh tundra, and behind her veiled marvels hides the real strength of the Pearl of the North. Since the dawn of time your people managed to endure the arduous challenges posed by arctic life and, with a grain of ingenuity and a bit of pride, they succeded to thrive under the solitary bliss of boreal lights. Despite every type of adversity the empire still has to defy, it can steadily rely on their virtues and on your advice for its future to continue to shine.
startIntroPart2: O Alyosha, princeps Aleksandri, the Motherland calls and invokes your ambition to fulfill your destiny and lead her people. Will you patronize the flourishing of arts and sciences or will you promote the thriving of arms and strife? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar:
The deeds sing, goddess, of the Motherland's son, Alyosha,
whose war enterprises brought countless glories upon the Comrades,
and sent forth to Hades many valiant enemies.
attacked: Finally someone ambitious enough to try to win me over. May you succeed or die under my triumph.
defeated:
I know nothing about what I ignore - I'm aware of it -
and yet still my latest realization burns my soul almost as much,
in pride, I have burnt till now.
introduction:
Zdravstvuyte! I am A1y0sh4, the empiring prince of our glorious Motherland,
but you can simply refer to me as Alyosha.
neutralYes: Our people are eager to accept.
hateLetsHearIt: Have you come here to negotiate your surrender?
hateYes: Its nice to see we agree on something from time to time.
afterPeace:
I must admit your military genius astonished me.
Consider yourself honored by my most sincere respect.
hateHello: Why are you still on this side of the Acheron?
tradeRequest:
Some believe that trade is the engine of the world.
Would you like to move it in this direction?
uniqueText:
City centers next to Tundra gain +1 [Culture] +1 [Science]
Gain +1 [Culture] from every Camp and Pasture adjacent to Tundra
+1 [Science] from every Mine and Quarry next to Tundra
The amounts of bonus [Culture] and [Science] double during a Golden Age
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [City center] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [City center] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [City center] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [City center] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Pasture] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Science] from every [Quarry] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]>
[+1 Culture] from every [Camp] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Culture] from every [Pasture] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [Mine] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Science] from every [Quarry] <within [1] tiles of a [Tundra]> <during a Golden Age>

name: Demolis
attacked: How foolish must you be to dare attack me?
introduction: Greetings, I am FastDoubloon115, leader of Demolis. Get ready to be demolished soon.
tradeRequest: Here's a fair trade for you:
uniqueText: All maluses from unhappiness (growth, production and strength) are reduced to -10%
uniques: [+40]% growth [in all cities] <when below [0] Happiness>
[+40]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
[+23]% Strength <for [All] units> <when below [-10] Happiness>

name: The Confederate States
declaringWar: Your wanton aggression leaves us no choice. Prepare for war!
attacked: You have mistaken our love of peace for weakness. You shall regret this!
defeated: The day...is yours. I hope you will be merciful in your triumph.
introduction: The people of the Confederate States of America welcome you.
tradeRequest: Is the following trade of interest to you?
uniqueText:
Plantations yield an additional +1 [Food], +1 [Gold] and +1 [Faith]
Cities within 2 tiles of a plantation suffer from 10% more unhappiness from population
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Gold, +1 Faith] from every [Plantation]
[+10]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <within [2] tiles of a [Plantation]>

name: The Philippines
startIntroPart1: Greetings, Emilio Aguinaldo, esteemed leader and first President of the Philippines. Your courage and determination ignited the flames of independence, leading your people in a revolutionary struggle against colonial powers. Under your command, the Philippine Republic was born, marking a new chapter in your nation’s storied history.
startIntroPart2: As you rise to lead the Philippines once more, may your strategic acumen and unwavering resolve guide your people to prosperity. Will you harness the spirit of Katipunan to unite your country and assert its place on the world stage? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: For the good of The Philipines i must declare war!
attacked: You are making a big mistake.
defeated: Will this be my last goodbye to you?.
introduction: Tell me, are you a barbarian, or are you as civilized as we are?
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.
uniqueText: Coast tiles yield an additional +1 [Culture] during a Golden Age and during We Love The King Day (cumulative bonus)
uniques: [+1 Culture] from every [Coast] <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Culture] from every [Coast] <during We Love The King Day>

name: Soviet Union
declaringWar: Proletarians of all countries, revolt against your oppressors!
defeated: You may have defeated our forces, but you'll never bend our ideals in favour of your exploitation.
introduction: Greetings, I am Lenin, leader of the communist revolution. I hope you will join soon our cause, in either one way or in another.
tradeRequest: In the name of the revolution, here is a fair offer:
uniqueText: Farms, Plantation, Mines and Quarries yield an additional +1 to each of their respective stats during a Golden Age
uniques: [+1 Food] from every [Farm] <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Food] from every [Plantation] <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Production] from every [Mine] <during a Golden Age>
[+1 Production] from every [Quarry] <during a Golden Age>

name: Papal States
attacked: I will do everything possible to ensure that the noble patrimony of the Church is not sold or alienated in any way.
defeated: I don't worry about my life, but about my fame.
introduction: Greetings, I am Julius II, the disciple of Christ and apostolic succesor to Saint Peter.
afterPeace: If you don't want to help the Church, at least don't bother her.
tradeRequest: If the Church is the body of Christ, then the Pope is his voice. Listen to what he has to say.
uniqueText:
Gain 150 [Faith] upon building a Wonder in capital (modified by game speed)
Gain [Gold] when converting cities to your religion and gain additional [Faith] from allied City-States
Double unhappiness from the number of cities
uniques: [+100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
Gain [100] [Faith] <upon constructing [Wonders] [in capital]> <(modified by game speed)>
Allied City-States provide [Faith] equal to [100]% of what they produce for themselves
When spreading religion to a city, gain [10] times the amount of followers of other religions as [Gold]
